display.title: Dispersal of Potion Effects
display.description: By throwing any regular Potion into a Boiling Cauldron along with a World Fragment (Growth) you can disperse it into the air causing is to affect all mobs in a large area around the cauldron [Required: 1x Any None Splash/Lingering Potion 1x World Fragment (Growth) | Drop Craft With: Boiling Cauldron]
